    protected

    Methods

    protected

    • assertUploadedFilesStructure() — Assert that each leaf is an UploadedFileInterface
    • copy() — Disconnect the global enviroment, turning stale
    • createUploadedFile() — Create an UploadedFile instance.
    • groupUploadedFiles() — Group data as provided by $_FILES
    • setUploadedFiles() — Set uploaded files
    • ungroupUploadedFiles() — Ungroup uploaded files and set $_FILES
    • ungroupUploadedFilesDeep() — Ungroup uploaded files and set a child of $_FILES

    public

    • getUploadedFiles() — Retrieve normalized file upload data.
    • withUploadedFiles() — Create a new instance with the specified uploaded files.
